name: Twilyte Phaser
description:
Simple platformer game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Art and sounds made by IDoPixelArt(https://idopixelart.itch.io/)

I didn't have enough time to add everything I wanted and apparently the way I did mobs was incredibly laggy so I had to scrap the idea and create a simple platformer without mobs.
